name: sc-failed-connection-request
description: Represents a BACnet Secure Connect (SC) failed connection request, including timestamps, peer information, and error details.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Timestamp when the connection attempt failed.

fields.name: peer-address
fields.description: Network address of the peer device.

fields.name: peer-vmac
fields.description: Virtual MAC address of the peer device. Optional.

fields.name: peer-uuid
fields.description: UUID of the peer device. Optional.

fields.name: error
fields.description: Error code for the failed connection attempt.

fields.name: error-details
fields.description: Additional error details if available. Optional.
